name: Forward Strike
flavor: A clean opening, delivered without hesitation.

name: Shieldwall
flavor: Hold the line; let the world break first.

name: Iron Discipline
flavor: You make a habit of pain before it finds you.

name: Hard March
flavor: Feet blister; pride doesn’t.

name: Cornered Beast
flavor: When there’s no room to flee, you bite back.

name: Crushing Blow
flavor: One decisive hit ends the argument.

name: Last Stand
flavor: You spend what you have left to stay standing.

name: Weapon Mastery
flavor: Practice turns fear into form.

name: Read the Room
flavor: Listen first. People tell you where to cut.

name: Map the Way
flavor: A good route is a quiet victory.

name: Studied Ledger
flavor: Numbers don’t lie—people do.

name: Keen Observation
flavor: Notice the detail everyone else skips.

name: Counterplan
flavor: Let them spring the trap—on your terms.

name: Forensic Reading
flavor: A smudge of ink can be a confession.

name: Scribe a Petition
flavor: Give the crowd a sentence to repeat.

name: Field Notes
flavor: Write it down before memory edits the truth.

name: False Papers
flavor: A seal, a signature, and a convincing smile.

name: Cutpurse
flavor: A purse is easiest to lift before it’s missed.

name: Silent Entry
flavor: Locks aren’t promises. They’re suggestions.

name: Misdirection
flavor: Point their eyes elsewhere; take what you came for.

name: Blackmail Whisper
flavor: A secret is leverage if you know where to press.

name: Vanish into the Crowd
flavor: Become a shadow between shoulders.

name: Poisoned Ink
flavor: Words can wound when placed just right.

name: Shadow Contact
flavor: Someone always owes someone.

name: Public Speech
flavor: You speak like you belong there.

name: Invoke Patronage
flavor: You drop a name and watch the room adjust.

name: Formal Audience
flavor: You let protocol do the pushing.

name: Seal of Authority
flavor: Act certain; they’ll do the rest for you.

name: Oath of Service
flavor: You trade freedom for protection—carefully.

name: Turn the Blame
flavor: Redirect the lantern before it finds you.

name: Dignified Refusal
flavor: You say no without giving them a handle.

name: Treaty Language
flavor: A contract is a blade with a polite edge.

name: Hold Fast
flavor: Breathe. Endure. Choose again.

name: Night Watch
flavor: The dark doesn’t scare you. You’ve met it before.

name: Steady Breath
flavor: Slow the pulse. Clear the head.

name: Shared Fire
flavor: Warmth makes allies of strangers.

name: Stubborn Refusal
flavor: You do not bend because they ask.

name: Pilgrim's Patience
flavor: Step by step, the road teaches restraint.

name: Cold Comfort
flavor: Some truths numb, some harden.

name: Unyielding Will
flavor: Even shaken, you keep your footing.

name: Spare Rations
flavor: A little food, saved for the right moment.

name: Quiet Prayer
flavor: A breath, a vow, and a steadier hand.

name: Clean Bandage
flavor: If it’s cleaned now, it won’t fester later.

name: Bitter Tonic
flavor: It tastes like punishment, but it works.

name: Candle of Witness
flavor: Light makes liars careful—and friends braver.

name: Practice Lances
flavor: Bruises teach faster than sermons.

name: House Colors
flavor: A banner speaks before you do.

name: Gatehouse Ruse
flavor: A borrowed seal. A confident nod. A door that opens.

name: Red Ink Audit
flavor: Numbers don't lie—people do.

name: Margin Gloss
flavor: The truth is often written sideways.

name: Cook the Books
flavor: If the ledger won't balance, make it.

name: Light Fingers
flavor: You never touch a purse the same way twice.

name: Keyhole Listener
flavor: Walls gossip. You just happen to be there.

name: Gutter Swing
flavor: A bottle, a brick, a lesson learned the hard way.

name: House Charter
flavor: A signature that turns favors into law.

name: Veiled Promise
flavor: Half a truth, perfectly placed.

name: Herald's Favor
flavor: The crowd leans your way before the first strike.

name: Reliquary Clue
flavor: A map of saints and shortcuts.

name: Hidden Ford
flavor: A river is kinder when you know its habits.

name: Hospice Candle
flavor: A steady flame in a sickroom buys another day.

name: Triage Orders
flavor: First stop the bleeding. Then ask names.

name: Ledger of the Dead
flavor: The missing names are the loudest.

name: Relic Escort
flavor: Guard the vessel. Ignore the whispers.

name: Inside Rate
flavor: A discount offered in private, collected in public.

name: Collections
flavor: Debt has a sound. It's your boots on the stair.

name: Quiet Cargo
flavor: Nothing to declare—nothing you can prove.

name: Highway Toll
flavor: Pay in silver or pay in blood.

name: Night Contract
flavor: A promise made where witnesses don't breathe.

name: Pardon Petition
flavor: A clean name costs more than coin.

name: Contract Blade
flavor: A signature on parchment, a sword at your back.

name: Knight's Vow
flavor: Hold your chin up. Let them choke on it.

name: Salted Iron
flavor: Old remedies. Old fears. Sometimes both work.

name: Trail Markers
flavor: Stones turned the right way save whole caravans.

name: Shade Pact
flavor: Share water. Share silence. Survive.

name: Sealed Dispatch
flavor: A message carried clean is power delivered.

name: Banner Charge
flavor: A standard lifted high turns fear into forward motion.

name: Hold the Line
flavor: When the world breaks, you do not.

name: Cited Precedent
flavor: In the right margin, the law becomes a weapon.

name: Greyvault Decipher
flavor: Ink remembers what people beg you to forget.

name: Shadow Brokerage
flavor: Every whisper has a price. You collect it.

name: Vanishing Route
flavor: You leave nothing behind but doubt.

name: Stamped Writ
flavor: An official seal turns doors into corridors.

name: Letter of Exception
flavor: The right paperwork makes shame a clerical error.

name: Basin Oath
flavor: A vow spoken over water steadies trembling hands.

name: Green Vigil
flavor: You keep watch beside suffering until it loosens its grip.
